skills.name: Trickster
skills.description: Attacks an enemy 3 times. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the enemy's Attack Speed for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your Attack Speed.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Ghost Appearance
skills.description: Calls upon the wandering souls to attack the target 4 times. Each hit has a 30% chance to increase the target's chances of landing a Glancing Hit for 2 turns. This attack will deal more damage according to your Attack Speed.
skills.level_progress_description:

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skills.name: Fire Starter
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times with each attack having a 50% chance to decrease the target's Attack Power and disturb their HP recovery for 2 turns.
